Hello,

I noticed that finding a good version of Antidote HD is pretty much impossible. So, since I have the files, I decided to share it to the world!

This is a functional version of Antidote HD. Although, I highly recommend NOT TO UPDATE IT, because I know that it might break the crack. I haven't tried to apply the crack after the update though, so it might work...at your own risk!

Antidote HD is a program that integrates itself in several other programs (Microsoft Office Word, Internet Explorer, Notepad). It can also be used as a standalone program. Its main function is to intelligently correct a text written in French. It has very advanced algorithms to detect all the complicated French grammar rules :) It also has an integrated dictionary, a thesaurus and several other things.

That sums it up...SEED, thanks a lot! :)
